bibl.title: Official Document.
bibl.note: Fragment of an official document (perhaps part of the so-called Theophanes Archive) mentioning the katholikos Arrius Diotimos. Hermopolis (?), c. AD 314. On the other side, account (not transcribed).

bibl.title: Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno.

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. I 12 recto = P. Pintaudi 15
Diletta Minutoli (a cura di), Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno (P.Pintaudi) (Firenze, 2012) pp. 71-73 et pl. XII.
Fragment of an official document (perhaps part of the so-called Theophanes Archive) mentioning the katholikos Arrius Diotimos. Hermopolis (?), c. AD 314. On the other side, account (not transcribed).
